explains: n. （法规、契约的）序言，绪论；前言，开场白
wordGroup: without preamble 直截了当地，开门见山地，单刀直入地

sentences.en: The aims of the treaty are stated in its preamble.
sentences.cn: 条约的宗旨已在序言中说明。

sentences.en: She gave him the bad news without preamble.
sentences.cn: 她开门见山地把坏消息告诉了他。

sentences.en: The controversy has arisen over the text of the preamble to the unification treaty.
sentences.cn: 就统一条约的序文措词出现了争论。
